name: African-American Actors Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: Will Smith starred in the entertaining "Legend of Bagger Vance". What sport was featured in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Golf.

	With Matt Damon. Wisdom often comes from unlikely sources.

questions.text: Which of these movies starred Wesley Snipes?
questions.explanation:
Jungle Fever.

	"Daisy" was Morgan Freeman. "Ivy" was Poitier. "Day" was Will Smith.

questions.text: Which of these movies starred Danny Glover?
questions.explanation:
Grand Canyon.

	"Canyon" was by Lawrence Kasdan ("Big Chill"). It had an ensemble cast that included Glover.

questions.text: Denzel Washington starred in John Grisham's "Pelican Brief". Who are the victims of the crimes in that movie?
options: Members of the House of Representatives
questions.explanation:
Supreme Court Justices.

	Not one of Grisham's best novels or movies.

questions.text: What ultimately happens to Morgan Freeman in "Shawshank Redemption"?
questions.explanation:
He is released from prison.

	With Tim Robbins. Long movie, but a good one.

questions.text: Which of the following does NOT star Denzel Washington?
questions.explanation:
Kiss the Girls.

	"Kiss" stars Freeman as Alex Cross. He reprised the role in "Along Came a Spider".

questions.text: Wesley Snipes stars in "Murder at 1600". Who plays one of the suspects?
questions.explanation:
Alan Alda.

	Could "Mr. Nice" be a bad guy?

questions.text: Danny Glover did a fine job in "The Color Purple". Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Alice Walker.

	Good movie all the way around. Oprah Winfrey's best role.

Denzel Washington.

	That's "Hurricane" Rubin Carter, the prizefighter.

Denzel Washington, Morgan Freeman.

	Matthew Broderick and the Civil War. Freeman and Washington - early in their careers.
